translations: 合理地说明（rationalize 的英式拼写）

sentences.sentence: Humans eat, sleep and play, but we also speak, plot, rationalise and debate finer points of morality.
sentences.translation: 人类吃饭、睡觉、玩耍，但也会谈论、策划、以及对更完善的道德观点进行合理化和辩论。

sentences.sentence: We are more likely to lie, research shows, when we are able to rationalise it, when we are stressed and fatigued or see others being dishonest.
sentences.translation: 研究表明，当我们能够合理解释谎言，当我们压力大、疲劳或看到别人不诚实时，我们更有可能撒谎。

sentences.sentence: We are more likely to lie, research shows, when we are able to rationalise it, when we are stressed and fa tigued or see others being dishonest.
sentences.translation: 研究表明，当我们能够为自己的行为找借口时，当我们压力大、说话刻薄或看不到别人诚实时，我们更有可能撒谎。
